abstract.t: This document describes a framework for the inter-working between Protocol Independent Multicast [PIM] and a leaf-driven P2MP tunnel signaling protocol such as [mRSVP-TE] or [mLDP] so that multiple PIM sites around an MPLS network can form a single PIM domain without compromising PIM's features, scalability, and performance. In this document, PIM modes PIM-SM, PIM-SSM, and PIM-BIDIR are considered.
